page.title: 07LOCAL HOUSING SCHEMES
page.content: With the improvement of the road system in Peterborough came the building of Bourges Boulevard. To made way for that two rows of railwaymens terraced cottages were demolished. At about the same time the Soke Parkway was built and many more houses in the Ravensthorpe and Westwood areas. One of the most recently completed building projects in our area is{Carl {Hall Court}which is in Tennyson Road. It is a sheltered housing project run by The Axiom Housing Association. Carl Hall Court includes accomodation for the handicapped and has wheelchair access. There is a special layout of kitchens,bathrooms ect. The warden has just moved in and the flats are now being offered to the first residents. Carl Hall is an ex-local councillor and Mayor of Peterborough.
